itemDisplayName: Simple ARM Template for a VM-Series VM (BYOL)
description: This template lets you do customized deployments of VM-Series instead of deploying from the Azure Marketplace. You can deploy using the
button  or download the template and customize it to your needs.
summary: Based on the Simple ARM Template by jigarhshah04 customed for an extra NIC, using managed disk and not creating Virtual Network or subnets
